唾罵.definition: to spit on and curse; to revile

唾面自乾.definition: to be spat on in the face and let it dry by itself, not wiping it off (idiom); to turn the other cheek; to drain the cup of humiliation

唾餘.definition: crumbs from the table of one's master; castoffs; bits of rubbish; idle talk; casual remarks
